autogluon.timeseries.description: AutoGluon TimeSeries automates forecasting model training for time series data, supporting both univariate and multivariate predictions.

autogluon.multimodal.description: AutoGluon Multimodal excels at multimodal classification, regression, document classification, and semantic segmentation tasks. The framework is not optimized for pure tabular data processing and doesn't support generative tasks (like image-to-image or sequence-to-sequence) or audio-related tasks. It also doesn't handle object detection.

autogluon.tabular.description: AutoGluon Tabular automates ML model training for tabular data, excelling at numerical and categorical data processing. It doesn't support NLP or image-based tasks.

FlagEmbedding.description: FlagEmbedding specializes in retrieval and reranking tasks.

machine learning.description: You should select this as a general reference of machine learning or deep learning algorithms in case other tools are not helpful.

fairseq.description: Fairseq is a comprehensive sequence modeling toolkit for training custom models across text and audio domains, supporting translation, summarization, language modeling, text generation, speech recognition, speech-to-speech translation, audio classification, speaker identification, and other audio understanding tasks.
